items.label: Topics in Computational and Systems Biology
items.shortLabel: Topics in Computational and Systems Biology
items.description: Seminar based on research literature. Papers covered are selected to illustrate important problems and different approaches in the field of computational and systems biology, and provide students a framework from which to evaluate new developments. Required of, and restricted to, first-year CSB PhD students.

items.label: Research Rotations in Computational and Systems Biology
items.shortLabel: Research Rotations in Computational and Systems Biology
items.description: Students carry out research rotations with MIT faculty members or principal investigators working in the field of computational and systems biology.  Generally three one-month long rotations are pursued that together span theoretical and experimental approaches. Open only to CSB PhD students.

items.label: Research Problems in Computational and Systems Biology
items.shortLabel: Research Problems in Computational and Systems Biology
items.description: Directed research in the field of computational and systems biology. Open only to CSB PhD students.

items.label: Graduate Thesis
items.description: Program of research leading to the writing of SM or PhD thesis; to be arranged by the student and the MIT faculty advisor.
